decision_martial_law.zhcn_desc:
当地政府的大部分职能已经停摆，整个星球受到军队的直接管制，其目的在于恢复正常的社会秩序。星球上的每个£job_soldier£ §Y士兵§!都将提供§G+5§!£stability£ §Y稳定度§!
£mod_job_soldier_add£ 士兵岗位：§G+2§!
§Y£job£ 岗位生产的资源§!减少§R33%§!
任何种类的£mod_pop_growth_speed£ §Y人口增长§!都将减少§R50%§!
decision_martial_law.en_desc:
Most local functions of government are suspended, and the planet is placed under direct military control in an attempt to restore civil order.£job_soldier£ §YSoldiers§! on the planet each provide §G+5§! £stability£ §YStability§!
£mod_job_soldier_add£ Soldier Jobs: §G+2§!
§YResources from £job£ Jobs§! reduced by §R33%§!
All forms of £mod_pop_growth_speed£ §YPop Growth§! reduced by §R50%§!
decision_martial_law.potential_logic:
▲拥有者：
is_regular_empire§H是§!
△没有修正§H戒严§!

decision_end_martial_law.zhcn_desc: 结束当前的戒严，恢复政府的正常运转。该星球上的戒严已经结束。
decision_end_martial_law.en_desc: End the ongoing military control of the planet and restore civilian functions of government.The state of Martial Law on the planet comes to end.

decision_martial_law_machine.zhcn_desc:
机械智能将会使用大量无人机监控设施，保证整个行星的人口正常运转与无条件服从。星球上的每个£job_warrior_drone£ §Y作战无人机§!都将提供§G+5§!£stability£ §Y稳定度§!
£mod_job_warrior_drone_add£ 作战无人机岗位：§G+2§!
§Y£job£ 岗位生产的资源§!减少§R33%§!
任何种类的£mod_pop_growth_speed£ §Y人口增长§!都将减少§R50%§!
decision_martial_law_machine.en_desc:
Through the use of extensive drone surveillance the Machine Intelligence can ensure planetside cooperation and compliance.£job_warrior_drone£ §YWarrior Drones§! on the planet each provide §G+5§! £stability£ §YStability§!
£mod_job_warrior_drone_add£ Warrior Drone Jobs: §G+2§!
§YResources from £job£ Jobs§! reduced by §R33%§!
All forms of £mod_pop_growth_speed£ §YPop Growth§! reduced by §R50%§!

decision_end_martial_law_machine.zhcn_desc: 结束当前行星上的高度警戒监控状态，恢复机械智能的正常运转。
decision_end_martial_law_machine.en_desc: End the state of heightened surveillance on the planet and restore normal machine functions.

decision_martial_law_hive.zhcn_desc:
通过启用这些专门为战争与暴力而创造的工蜂，蜂巢思维能够保证这个星球上任何不和谐的元素均被尽快消除。星球上的每个£job_warrior_drone£ §Y作战无人机§!都将提供§G+5§!£stability£ §Y稳定度§!
£mod_job_warrior_drone_add£ 作战无人机岗位：§G+2§!
§Y£job£ 岗位生产的资源§!减少§R33%§!
任何种类的£mod_pop_growth_speed£ §Y人口增长§!都将减少§R50%§!

Through the deployment of specialized warforms, the Hive Mind can ensure that rogue elements on the planet are found and dealt with.£job_warrior_drone£ §YWarrior Drones§! on the planet each provide §G+5§! £stability£ §YStability§!
£mod_job_warrior_drone_add£ Warrior Drone Jobs: §G+2§!
§YResources from £job£ Jobs§! reduced by §R33%§!

decision_end_martial_law_hive.en_desc: End the state of heightened watchfulness on the planet and restore normal hive functions.

decision_expel_population.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上的人口过于拥挤，需要我们采取极端措施。星球上将展开一场大规模的“抽奖活动”，而“胜者”将被驱逐，如有必要甚至可采用强制手段。从星球上驱逐§Y最多10§! £pop£ 人口以减少拥挤。被驱逐的人口将成为难民，并可能在其他帝国定居。
decision_expel_population.en_desc: The overcrowded conditions on this world require drastic measures. A massive planet-wide lottery is held, and the "winners" are expelled - by force, if necessary.Expels §Yup to 10§! £pop£ Pops from the Planet to reduce overcrowding. Expelled Pops will become refugees and may settle in other empires.
decision_expel_population.potential_logic:
▲拥有者：
is_regular_empire§H是§!
△没有政策标识§H禁止§!

decision_discourage_growth.zhcn_desc: 若在某个世界资源和生活空间十分稀缺，计划生育就有实施的必要。 实行政策减少人口的自然增长。
decision_discourage_growth.en_desc: If resources and living space are at a premium, population planning might be necessary on this world. Measures will then be taken to voluntarily curtail population growth.

decision_prospect.en_desc: Extensive surveying and prospecting of the planet will let us uncover the presence of natural resources that may otherwise have eluded us.Adds a random §YPlanetary Feature§! to the planet.

decision_penal_colony.zhcn_desc: 将这整颗星球作为一座巨大的惩戒殖民地。庞大的监狱社群基本上由囚犯们自治，而惩罚通常意味着被流放到严酷的荒野中。
decision_penal_colony.en_desc: This entire world is set aside as a massive penal colony. The vast prison communities are largely self-managed by the prisoners, and punishment often means exile into the unforgiving wilderness.
decision_penal_colony.potential_logic:

△有修正§H度假星球§!

▲拥有者：

№是栖息地：§H否§!

decision_abolish_penal_colony.zhcn_desc: 解除这颗星球的惩戒殖民地身份，其居民也将获得与其它星球的居民同样的权利与责任。
decision_abolish_penal_colony.en_desc: The status as a penal colony is removed from this world, and its inhabitants are afforded the same rights and responsibilities as any other planet.

decision_slave_colony.zhcn_desc: 通过各种繁殖促进手段，这个世界专为最大化其奴隶人口的成长率而设计。在星球上停用£housing£ §Y城市区划§!以及大多数£building£ §Y建筑§!的建造\n允许建造£building£ §Y奴隶小屋§!\n£pop£ §Y自由人口§!无法在星球上增长
decision_slave_colony.en_desc: This entire world is purpose-built to maximize the growth rate of its enslaved population through a variety of reproductive incentives.Disables construction of £housing£ §YCity Districts§! and most £building£ §YBuildings§! on the planet\nAllows construction of £building£ §YSlave Huts§!\n£pop£ §YFree Pops§! can no longer grow on the planet

decision_abolish_slave_colony.zhcn_desc: 该星球将不再作为奴隶世界，针对其奴隶人口的繁殖促进措施也将停止。
decision_abolish_slave_colony.en_desc: This world will no longer be considered a Thrall-World, and growth incentive programs for its shackled population are ended.

decision_resort_colony.zhcn_desc: 将该星球定为一颗宁静致远的度假星球，吸引四面八方的游客和访客。为了保护星球的自然风光，地表建筑将受到很大限制。
decision_resort_colony.en_desc: This world is set aside as a peaceful resort world, attracting tourists and visitors from far away. To preserve the planet's natural beauty, construction on the surface is severely limited.

decision_abolish_resort_colony.zhcn_desc: 该星球将不再作为特殊度假胜地，所有地表建造限制也将解除。
decision_abolish_resort_colony.en_desc: This world will no longer be considered a special resort, and all construction restrictions on its surface are lifted.

decision_mastery_of_nature.zhcn_desc: 我们的人民需要更多空间繁衍生息，所以我们就得创造空间。决不能让大自然阻挡我们的进步之路。
decision_mastery_of_nature.en_desc: Our population requires room to grow, and so we shall make that room. Nature must not stand in the way of progress.

decision_consecrated_worlds.zhcn_desc: 宣布此处为我方宗教信仰的圣域。信仰我教的虔诚信徒们将会为了一睹圣域而千里迢迢而来。添加此行星为圣地世界（最多§Y3§!个）提升其§Y唯心主义种族思潮吸引力§!、§Y帝国舒适度§!、以及£unity£ §Y凝聚力产出§!，具体效果视乎于该行星的宗教影响力。
decision_consecrated_worlds.en_desc: Declare this to be a sacred place, consecrated in the traditions of our faith. Pilgrims will travel from afar to rejoice in its holy aura.Adds this world to our canon of Consecrated Worlds (up to §Y3§!), increasing §YSpiritualist Ethics Attraction§!, §YEmpire-Wide Amenities§! and boosting £unity£ §YUnity Generation§!, scaling to the spiritual significance of the planet.

decision_arcology_project.zhcn_desc: 无边无际的理想城覆盖了行星上的每一个角落，形成一个环球都会，一个普世之城。将星球变成§Y都市星球§!，增加£housing£  §Y住房§!，§Y资源生产§!和§Y人口增长§!并解锁特殊的£district£  §Y理想城区划§!，代价是星球的天然资源将§R无法被开发§!，无法建造£district£  §Y发电§!，§Y采矿§!和§Y农业区划§!。
decision_arcology_project.en_desc: An unceasing stretch of arcologies will unite the planet from pole to pole, creating one global megacity, one ecumenopolis.Turns the planet into an §YEcumenopolis§!, increasing £housing£ §YHousing§!, §YResource Production§! and §YPop Growth§! and unlocking special £district£ §YArcology Districts§! at the expense of the planet's natural resources becoming §Rinaccessible§!, preventing all further construction of £district£ §YGenerator§!, §YMining§! and §YAgriculture Districts§!.

decision_arcology_project_relic.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星曾经是一个充满生机的都市星球。重建星球的任务十分艰巨，但我们可以恢复其往日的辉煌。将星球变成§Y都市星球§!，增加£housing£  §Y住房§!，§Y资源生产§!和§Y人口增长§!并解锁特殊的£district£  §Y理想城区划§!，代价是星球的天然资源将§R无法被开发§!，无法建造£district£  §Y发电§!，§Y采矿§!和§Y农业区划§!。
decision_arcology_project_relic.en_desc: This planet was once a vibrant ecumenopolis. It would be a monumental task, but the planet could be rebuilt and restored to its former glory.Turns the planet into an §YEcumenopolis§!, increasing £housing£ §YHousing§!, §YResource Production§! and §YPop Growth§! and unlocking special £district£ §YArcology Districts§! at the expense of the planet's natural resources becoming §Rinaccessible§!, preventing all further construction of £district£ §YGenerator§!, §YMining§! and §YAgriculture Districts§!.
decision_arcology_project_relic.potential_logic:
▲星球类型是§H遗落星球§!
№是栖息地：§H否§!
▲§H拥有者：§!存在

is_regular_empire§H是§!

num_uncleared_blockers< 1

▲拥有§H反重力工程§!科技

decision_market_nomination.zhcn_name: 泛星系贸易市场中心提名
decision_market_nomination.zhcn_desc: 成为银河贸易的枢纽可谓名利双收。市场风云莫测，但只要给出足够的有利条件，我们或许可以引诱贸易巨头们进驻这颗星球。基于当地状况，为星球添加§Y基础市场竞争力评分§!修正。评分越高，星球就越有可能被§H泛星系贸易市场§!选中。
decision_market_nomination.en_desc: Being nexus of galactic trade is a position as prestigious as it is profitable. The market is fickle, but with enough incentives we might be able to lure the big players to establish themselves on this planet.Applies a §YBase Marketplace Competitiveness Rating§! modifier to the planet, according to its local conditions. The better the rating, the more likely the planet will play host to the future §HGalactic Market§!.

decision_study_the_sea.zhcn_desc: 初步报告显示这星球上的海洋从某种程度上来说居然是活的，其中包含着一种我们从来都没见过的外星实体。研究员提议组建一个轨道研究站以更加深入研究这种生物。低轨道研究站能够用来研究活海洋。\n\n预定对其进行升级。
decision_study_the_sea.en_desc: Preliminary reports suggest the ocean covering this planet is somehow alive, comprising an alien entity unlike any we've encountered before. Researchers propose an extended orbital study be organized in order to learn more about this mysterious being.A low-orbit research outpost will be established to study the living sea.\n\nUpdates are to be expected.
decision_study_the_sea.potential_logic:
▲有修正§H自觉之海§!
№恒星系所属者
№有事件链living_planet_chain
△没有国家标识completed_living_sea

decision_divine_algorithm.zhcn_desc: 这座中枢建筑的本地磁盘正在运行奴玛女神的神圣算法插件，提高了整座星球的能源产量。
decision_divine_algorithm.en_desc: The local drive on this hub is running Numa's Divine Algorithm add-on for improved energy production planetwide.

decision_art_monument.en_desc: Exhibit the stirring art monument created for our nation by the Artisan Troupe. It is sure to delight and inspire our citizens.

decision_demolish_art_monument.zhcn_desc: 拆除由艺术家联盟为我们国家创作的艺术纪念碑。
decision_demolish_art_monument.en_desc: Remove the art monument created for our nation by the Artisan Troupe.

decision_launch_anticrime_campaign.zhcn_desc: 开展大型打击犯罪行动，为执法者们提供更多资源，以对抗日渐上升的犯罪率。
decision_launch_anticrime_campaign.en_desc: Launches an extensive crime prevention campaign which empowers our Enforcers with additional resources to combat rising crime levels.

decision_end_anticrime_campaign.zhcn_desc: 结束目前正在进行的打击犯罪活动。
decision_end_anticrime_campaign.en_desc: Put an end to the ongoing crime prevention campaign.

decision_negotiate_with_crime_lords.zhcn_desc: 与星球上势力最大的犯罪头目进行秘密交涉，只要他们不做过于出格显眼的事情我们就在许多方便做出一定的让步。
decision_negotiate_with_crime_lords.en_desc: Secretly negotiate a deal with the planet's prominent criminal leaders where they agree to keep their organizations partly in line in exchange for various concessions.
decision_negotiate_with_crime_lords.potential_logic:
▲拥有者：

decision_end_crime_lord_deal.zhcn_name: 终止与犯罪头目的交易
decision_end_crime_lord_deal.zhcn_desc: 终止我们与星球上的首要犯罪分子之间进行的交易。这将在星球上造成一段时间的大幅动荡。
decision_end_crime_lord_deal.en_desc: End our ongoing deal with the leading criminal elements on the planet. This will cause considerable turmoil on the planet for a time.
decision_end_crime_lord_deal.potential_logic: ▲有修正§H与犯罪头目达成协议§!

decision_caravaneer_bunkbeds.zhcn_desc: 高效的范格利牌可堆叠睡眠箱可以降低这个星球的住房需求。
decision_caravaneer_bunkbeds.en_desc: Efficient Trium-brand stackable sleep enclosures reduce housing needs on this world.
decision_caravaneer_bunkbeds.allow_logic: △没有修正§H§H范格利集团§!：已部署双层床铺§!

decision_caravaneer_tupperware.zhcn_desc: 使用范格利牌食品容器可降低这颗星球上的食物浪费。
decision_caravaneer_tupperware.en_desc: The use of Trium-brand food storage containers reduce food waste on this world.
decision_caravaneer_tupperware.allow_logic: △没有修正§H§H范格利集团§!：已部署食品保鲜容器§!

decision_caravaneer_atmospheric_deodoriz.zhcn_name: 范格利大气层除臭器部署
decision_caravaneer_atmospheric_deodoriz.zhcn_desc: 大气层清洗器可使这颗星球的空气如薄荷般清新。
decision_caravaneer_atmospheric_deodoriz.en_desc: Atmospheric scrubbers lend the air on this planet a quality of minty freshness.
decision_caravaneer_atmospheric_deodoriz.allow_logic: △没有修正§H§H范格利集团§!：大气层除臭器已部署§!

decision_tissue_growth_stimulants.zhcn_desc: 利用在失落的骸骨之城发现的基因物质，我们的科学家成功地创造了一种增加人口成长速度的刺激物。不幸的是，有些人并不喜欢这种主意——注射靠发掘早已死去的外星生物的病态骸骨研发的物质。
decision_tissue_growth_stimulants.en_desc: Using genetic materials recovered from the fallen City of Bones, our scientists have been able to devise a stimulant for increased population growth speed. Unfortunately, some populations dislike the idea of being injected with a substance developed by exhuming the diseased bones of long-dead aliens.

decision_explosive_fungifoam_housing.zhcn_name: 建造爆发增殖式真菌型住宅单元
decision_explosive_fungifoam_housing.zhcn_desc: 我们的科研小组基于骸骨之城发掘到的生长组织和骨化疾病，发明出了一种无害的汞合金。通过基因剪接能够病毒适应当地的一种真菌，从而我们的科研小组能为我们的机械单元构造一种快速扩展的住房模块。
decision_explosive_fungifoam_housing.en_desc: Our scientific units have devised a harmless amalgam of the tissue growth and ossification disease found in the exhumed remains of the City of Bones. By adapting the virus responsible to a local fungus via gene tailoring, our scientific units are able to construct rapidly-expanding housing modules for our machine units.
decision_explosive_fungifoam_housing.allow_logic: △没有修正§H爆发增殖式真菌型住宅单元§!

decision_baol_life_seed.zhcn_desc: 我们的基因学家已经洞悉了§Y巴奥有机体§!的改造星系能力的秘密。通过在行星部署快速增殖的经过特殊选择的§Y巴奥§!基因数据修饰的植物，我们能够利用极少的花费对整个生物圈进行改造。通过部署基因裁剪并被注射独特的§Y巴奥§!从而具有有机星球改造能力的植物，将行星转变成§Y盖亚星球§! 。
decision_baol_life_seed.en_desc: Our geneticists have extracted the secret of the §YBaol Organism§!'s ability to terraform a planet. By deploying rapidly-reproducing plant life modified with specially selected §YBaol§! genetic data to the planet, we can terraform entire biospheres at a fraction of the cost.Turns the planet into an §YGaia World§!, by deploying gene-tailored plant life injected with the unique §YBaol§! ability of organic terraforming.

decision_museum_exhibits.zhcn_name: 运送文物到博物馆展出
decision_museum_exhibits.zhcn_desc: 将一些次级遗物公开展出，用过去的奇观来激励我们的人民。
decision_museum_exhibits.en_desc: Put the minor artifacts on public display to inspire our people with the wonders of the past.

decision_manager_awards.zhcn_desc: 执行官和经理们将进行竞争，从而为为企业带来最大价值。表现最佳的可以获得把这些文物安置在他们更新更大的办公室中进行展示的权力。
decision_manager_awards.en_desc: The Executives and Managers will compete to bring the most value to the corporation. The best performing will get to display these artifacts in their new larger offices.

decision_sanctuary_exhibits.zhcn_name: 将文物送至有机庇护所
decision_sanctuary_exhibits.zhcn_desc: 公开展出稀有文物，用过去的奇观取悦我们的活体陈设。
decision_sanctuary_exhibits.en_desc: Put the minor artifacts on public display to entertain our Bio-Trophies with the wonders of the past.
decision_sanctuary_exhibits.potential_logic:
▲拥有者：
▲拥有国民理念：§H失控机仆§!

decision_artifact_relays_hivemind.zhcn_desc: 通过使用稀有文物中继信号，我们的突触工蜂得以强化我们所有低级子个体的效率。每个星球上的 £job_synapse_drone£ §Y突触工蜂§!提供§G+1%§!低级子个体产出并提供§G+2§!稳定度。
decision_artifact_relays_hivemind.en_desc: By using minor artifacts to relay signals, our Synapse Drones are able to enhance the efficiency of all of our Menial Drones.£job_synapse_drone£ §YSynapse Drones§! on the planet each provide §G+1%§! Menial Drone Output and §G+2§! Stability.

decision_artifact_relays_machine.zhcn_desc: 通过使用稀有文物中继信号，我们的协调者得以强化我们所有低级子个体的效率。每个星球上的 £job_coordinator£ §Y协调者§!提供§G+1%§!低级子个体产出并提供§G+2§!稳定度。
decision_artifact_relays_machine.en_desc: By using minor artifacts to relay signals, our Coordinators are able to enhance the efficiency of all of our Menial Drones.£job_coordinator£ §YCoordinators§! on the planet each provide §G+1%§! Menial Drone Output and §G+2§! Stability.

decision_machine_oracle.zhcn_desc: 激活神谕中枢的合规性软件和预测模型以消除无人机的反常倾向。
decision_machine_oracle.en_desc: Activates Oracle Nexus compliance software and predictive modeling to obviate drone corruption.

decision_yuht_cleanseplanet.zhcn_desc: 武力消灭行星上大多数敌对的野生动物，并且——当行星恢复完好——改造生物圈使之更符合我们的需要。
decision_yuht_cleanseplanet.en_desc: Violently eradicates most hostile wildlife from a planet and - once it recovers - modifies the biosphere to better suit our needs.

can_have_habitable_deposits§H是§!
